trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of object-bound smart tag with respect to how it was associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il tipo di oggetto associato smart tag rispetto alla modalità era associato al componente.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the two options for associating an object-bound smart tag to a component.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente descrive le due opzioni per l'associazione di un oggetto associato a un componente di smart tag.

trans-unit.source: |Smart-tag model|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |Pull|The class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> that is associated with the component overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property to return the collection of smart tags for that component.| |Push|A call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method explicitly associates the specified smart tags with the specified component.| For more information about these smart-tag models, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: | Smart tag modello | Descrizione | |----------------------|-----------------| | Pull | La classe derivata da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>che è associato il componente esegue l'override della proprietà <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>per restituire la raccolta di smart tag per il componente. | | Push | Una chiamata al metodo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>associa in modo esplicito gli smart tag specificati con il componente specificato. | Per ulteriori informazioni sui modelli smart tag, vedere il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>classi.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>
Entrambi i tipi di smart tag.
